original_text: There was a captain of the soldiers there. When he saw what had happened, he praised God. He said. ‘I am sure that this man had not done anything wrong.’
korean_text: 백부장이 그 된 일을 보고 하나님께 영광을 돌려 이르되 이 사람은 정녕 의인이었도다 하고

sentences.original_text: There was a captain of the soldiers there
When he saw what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 무슨 일이 일어났는지 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: that this man had not done anything wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람은 아무 잘못도 하지 않았다고
